15676.「ケガを負って 帰って以来\n ずっと 村王の熱が下がらなかったのだが\n さき:
Ever since he returned home after being injured, the village king's fever had been persistent, but just now he finally lost
consciousness...

15677.「こ このままでは 村王の 命が危ない！\n 急いで 解熱薬を用意せねばならん！:
At this rate, the Village King's life is in
danger! We must hurry and get an antifebrile!

15678.「<pc>よ！ 材料となる\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>と <%sEV_:
<pc>! Can you bring me Superior
Medicine and Softwort as soon as possible!

15679.「ありがたい！ どちらも 特別なことをせずとも\n 手に入るものだ！ もし見つか:
Thank God! You don't have to do anything
special to get either! If you can't find them,
try looking at the Traveler's Bazaar!

15680.「私は 村王から 目が離せん！\n よろしく頼むぞ！！:
I can't take my eyes off the Village King!
I'm counting on you!!

15681.「やってくれるか……。\n だが 頼まれごとで いっぱいではないか！:
Will you do it... but I'm afraid you're full
of requests!

15682.「手遅れになる前に 頼みを聞ける状態にして\n また来てくれ！ 急ぐのだぞ！ い:
Come back when you're ready to do me a favor
before it's too late! And hurry up! I'm on it!

15683.「お前だけが 頼りなのだ！\n そう言わずに もう一度 考え直してくれ！: You're the only one I can count on!

15685.「村王が 熱で 意識を失ってしまった……。\n このままでは 命が危ない！\n:
The Village King has lost consciousness due to
fever... His life is in danger! We must
quickly prepare an antifebrile!

15686.「<pc>よ！ 材料となる\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>と <%sEV_:
<pc>! Can you bring me Superior
Medicine and Softwort as soon as possible!

15688.「む……。どうやら まだ\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>と <%sEV_Q:
Hmm... Seems like you still can't get Superior
Medicine and Softwort...

15689.「ならば ここに来ている場合ではない！\n 解熱薬の材料を 急いで 集めてきてく:
Then this is no time to be here! Hurry up and
get me the ingredients for the antifebrile!

15690.「どうだ！\n 解熱薬の材料は 手に入ったか！:
How's it going? You got the stuff for the
antifebrile!

15691.ギュランに <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>と\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME5: Give Guran Superior Medicine and Softwort?<yesno><close>

15692.「……そうか。まだ 手に入らないか。\n ならば ここに来ている場合ではない！\:
I see. Still can't get it? Then this is no
time to be here! Hurry up and get me the
ingredients for the antifebrile!

15693.<pc>は ギュランに\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>と\n<%sEV_QU:
<pc> gave Guran Superior Medicine and
Softwort!

15694.「おおっ！ ありがたい！\n さっそく 解熱薬を 調合しよう！\n これで 村王:
Oh! Thank God! Let's mix up some antifebrile
medicine right away! Now we can save the
village king!

15695.「よく眠っておられる……。\n どうやら 落ち着いたようだ。:
He is sleeping well... apparently he has
calmed down.

15696.「しばらく ゆっくり眠れば\n また元気な村王に 戻られるだろう。\n ありがと:
I'm sure after a good night's sleep, he'll be
back to being a healthy village king again.
Thanks to <pc>.

15697.「……私は １０年 お仕えしているが\n 村王の お気持ちは まだまだ\n 理解:
...I have served him for 10 years, but there
are still many things I don't understand about
the feelings of the Village Chief.

15698.「……だが 心から 人に優しい方であることは\n 知っている。今 多くを語られな:
But I know that he is a kind person from the bottom of his heart. I think there must be a good reason why he does not say much at this
time...

15700.「やめんかっ！ 村王は お休み中だ！: Stop it! The Village King is on vacation!

15701.「た 大変なんです！！: I'm so sorry, but I'm in trouble!

15702.「何事だ。\n つまらんことだったら 承知せんぞ。:
What is this? I'll be damned if it's something
trivial.

15703.「む 村の武闘場に\n 見たことのないヤツが 入り込んできて\n 占拠してるんで:
I've never seen anyone like him before! He has
entered the Village Arena and is occupying it!

15704.「で そいつは 自分のことを\n 死神だとか 言ってやがるんです！:
And he's calling himself a Reaper or
something!

15706.「それは 確かに ただごとではないな。\n 村王が このようなときに\n 村を:
That is certainly not a trivial matter. That
the village would be attacked at a time
like this...

15707.「<pc>よ！\n すまないが 武闘場の様子を\n 見にいってくれ！:
<pc>! I'm sorry, but I need you to go
check on the fighting field!

15708.「味方が増えるのは ありがたい！\n 一緒に 行きましょう！:
Thank God we have more allies! Come on, let's
go!

15709.「<pc>っ！\n 私は 村王のそばから 離れられん！:
<pc>! I cannot leave the Village
King's side!

15710.「武闘場の様子を 見にいってくれ！\n 頼れるのは お前だけだ！ 頼むぞ！:
Go and check on the battlefield! You're the
only one I can count on! Please!

15712.「強さこそ至上と唱えた ランガーオ村とは\n とても思えぬ 歯ごたえのなさだ。:
It is hard to believe that Langao Village,
which advocated the supremacy of strength, is
so toothless.

15714.「ランガーオ村の 愚民どもに告ぐ！\n オレは 今から この村を 滅ぼす！！:
To the fools of Langao Village! I will now
destroy this village!

15715.「不意打ちのような ひきょうなマネはしない。\n 戦う意志のあるやつは\n 全員:
We will not be so cowardly as to take you by
surprise. Anyone who is willing to fight, we
will fight!

15716.「さあ 好きなタイミングで かかってこい！\n 束になってきても 構わんぞ！！:
Come at me when you want! I don't care if you
come in a bunch!

15717.「やれやれ。どうやら 今\n この村にいるのは 戦う勇気さえも失った\n 情けな:
Oh dear. It seems that the only people in this
village now are pathetic ogres who have lost
the courage to even fight.

15718.「ならば こっちも遠慮はせん。\n 端から順番に 殺していってやろう。\n 命乞:
Then we won't hold back either. We'll kill
them one by one. Those who want to beg for
their lives, scream as loud as you can.

15719.「き き 貴様ぁ！\n 次は…… 次は オ オレが相手だ！: You, you! Next time... next time, it'll be me!

15720.「よし。それでこそ\n ランガーオ村の 勇気あるオーガだ。\n 次に死ぬのは お:
Good. That's the brave Ogre of Langao Village.
The next one to die will be you.

15722.「ギュランよ……。すまんな。\n ここからは ひとりで行く。: Guran... I'm sorry. I'll go alone from here.

15724.「……ガガイよ。\n 今 この村には お前に勝てるような\n 強いオーガは ひと:
...Gagai. There is not a single ogre in this
village strong enough to defeat you right
now...

15725.「……だが わしは この村の王だ。\n たとえ どんなことをしてでも\n 村の者:
But I am the king of this village. I must
protect the people of this village no matter
what it takes.

15726.「これが 今の わしにできる すべてだ。: That is all I can do right now.

15727.「この通りだ。頼む……。\n この村の者を 殺さないでくれ……。\n わしの命な:
As you can see. Please don't kill anyone from
this village and I'll give you as much of my
life as you want.

15730.「見るがいい ランガーオ村の者たちよ！\n これが 貴様らが 村王などと呼び\n:
Behold, the men of Langao Village! This is the
true form of the man you call your village
king!

15731.「つい先日のことだ。\n この男は オレとの真剣勝負に敗れた。\n 今も そのキ:
It was just the other day. This man lost a serious fight with me. Even now, he seems to be unable to move with satisfaction due to
that scar.

15732.「この男は 敗者だ！\n 貴様らは それを知っても この男を\n 同じように 村:
This man is a loser! And you know it, but you
can continue to call him your Village King
just the same!

15734.「そうだよっ！ 村王は 村王だもん！\n 勝者とか敗者とか そんなのカンケーない:
That's right! The Village King is the Village
King! Winners and losers don't matter!

15737.「この村に お前の居場所は なーいっ！\n 早々に 立ち去れい！:
You have no place in this village! Now, get
out of here!

15739.「……ガガイよ。今は ちがうのだ。\n ランガーオ村は 変わったのだ。:
...Gagai. Things are different now. Langao
Village has changed.

15741.「変わったなど オレは認めんっ！！\n 貴様ら 皆殺しにしてやるっ！！:
I don't accept that you've changed! I will
kill you all!

15742.「<cs_pchero>っ！ 村王を！\n 村王を お守りしてくれっ！！:
<cs_pchero>! The village king! Protect the
village king!

15744.「今度こそ ガガイを倒し 村王を……\n いや この村を 守ってくれっ！！:
This time, you must defeat Gagai and protect
the village king... or rather, this village!

15745.「何度やっても 同じことだ！\n この村のやつらは ひとり残らず\n 殺してやる:
It's the same thing over and over again! I'll
kill every last one of you in this village!

15747.「……これが 神の意志だというのか。\n 親子二代に渡り 同じ場所で\n 同じ屈:
...that this is the will of God. For two
generations, father and son, to die in the
same place, covered in the same humiliation...

15749.「お前たちが 父と母にしたのと同じように\n 敗れた弱者を さげすみながら\n:
You can kill me, just as you did my father
and mother, while belittling the weak and
defeated!

15753.「どっちも サイコーに かっけーぜっ！\n オイラ チョーあこがれちまうぜーっ！: They're both so cool! I'm so hot for you guys!

15754.「見てくれ ガガイ。\n このランガーオ村は 変わったのだ。:
Look at this, Gagai. This Langao Village has
changed.

15755.「死への恐怖に打ち勝ち 勇気を持って\n 戦った両者を 等しく敬え。\n それが:
Honor equally both those who overcame their
fear of death and fought bravely. That is the
current teaching of this village.

15756.「お前が 村を出ていってから\n ２０年かけて…… この教えを\n 村の皆に 行:
I have spent the last 20 years since you left
the village spreading this teaching to
everyone in the village.

15757.「ガガイよ。言わば お前の父親の死が\n 今の この村の姿を 作ったのだ……。:
Gagai. Your father's death, so to speak, made
this village what it is today...

15760.「お前には この村で 暮らしてほしい。\n そして その強さを\n この村のため:
I want you to live in this village. And I want
you to use your strength for the good of this
village.

15761.「それが かなえば きっと\n ガガベスも 報われるだろう……。:
If that were to happen, I'm sure Gagabes would
be rewarded...

15762.「これは 私も 最近 村人から聞いて\n 知ったことだが……。:
This is something I recently learned from a
Villager myself...

15763.「この村では 当時 敗者の墓を作ることは\n 禁じられていた。だが 村王は オキ:
In this village, it was forbidden to make tombs for the defeated. However, the village king broke the law and built a tomb for Lord
Gagabes, which is still being used as a memorial.

15764.「墓を作ったことも 新しい教えを\n 行きわたらせたことも すべては いつの日か:
Everything we did, from building tombs to spreading the new teachings, was done in the hope that one day we would welcome you to our
village.

15765.「ガガイ殿よ……。\n どうか 村王の気持ちを 察してくれまいか。:
Dear Gagai... please, I hope you can
understand the feelings of the village king.

15767.「だが……オレには オレの けじめがある。\n この村で 暮らすことは できない:
But I have my own reasons. I cannot live in
this village.

15768.「オレは 罪を重ねすぎた……。: I've been guilty of too many things.

15769.「ありがとう <cs_pchero>よ。\n まったく お前には\n 最後まで:
Thanks <cs_pchero>. You've been a great help
to me all this time.

15770.「せめてものことは させてほしい。\n 後で わしの所に 来てくれ。:
Let me do the least I can do. Come to me
later.

50294.「そうだそうだ！\n オレたちが 村王を尊敬しているのは\n 強いからだけじゃな:
That's right! We respect the Village King not
only because he's strong!

50295.「あたしたちは 村王が 立派な人だから\n 心から 尊敬してるんだよ！:
We respect the Village King from the bottom of
our hearts because he's a fine man!

50296.「ガガイーっ！\n お前は 負けはしたが すごかったぞー！: Gah! You may have lost, but you were awesome!

50297.「最後まで あきらめずに戦い続けて\n <cs_pchero>も ガガイも 本当:
You and Gagai are really doing a great job!
I'm so moved I could cry!
